tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We had visited many doctors before meeting to Ma'am *** *********** *** *** *** **** ***** **** The way she listens to our problems and explains every bit to us in common words is simply marvelous. We had visited her for pregnancy issues and by going ahead found many more issues but still we were confident that everything will be okay because of ma'am. She explains everything with a smile on her face, which certainly takes aways our concern. She's definitely very friendly and a motherly character, which helps patients to open up in front of her. Thank you very much ma'am. All your efforts are appreciable. Certainly recommendable to everyone.
Doctor was available as per the time ans was friendly and helpful,  diagnossied problem properly ........................

Disappointed!! We had to return without any solution to the problem. Dr. Prescribed a few blood tests and we thought the test reports will be given soon but, the reports will be available Monday since next day is Sunday **** **** ******* And they were insisting to get the tests done there itself..  we have now returned to home without any treatment and my wife is suffering this night..

even though doctors consultancy is good. they reject any other tests previously done and if you insist on tests done outside, they simply say don't come back again here if you do. else do test here itself. * **** **** **** *** ** ** ***** * ******* **** * *** ******
**** ****** ***** *** listen caret without hesitation.i will recommend this doctor for pregnancy related query

You need to update your consultation fee because it's 600 not 500.
Otherwise doctor was good, she was calm and listened to the problem then suggested the treatment.
****** ** **** ****** However.. Apollo should take care minimun check ups like weight and BP..they didnt check any of these and directly sent mw to doctor.

review: Doctor was not available and we were not even informed this is so unprofessional. Patient has been suffering and we needed an immediate attention but instead we were asked to come next day.
